Ranti Bam (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Britain-Nigerian na-ese ihe sitere na London na Lagos nke a maara maka ọrụ ụrọ ya mara mma na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ejiri usoro ụrọ dị iche iche mee.
A mụrụ Ranti Bam na Lagos, Nigeria ma a zụlitere ya na London. O nwetara MA na School of Art, Architecture and Design na London (nke bụbu The Cass), mee njem n'ọtụtụ ebe, ma biri na Gris
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na City Lit, London.

Bam ekwuola na ihe gbara ya ume bu na e nwere ike ime nka na ụrọ mgbe ọ gara ihe ngosi Africa Remix na Hayward Gallery na London: "Ọ dị ka mmeghe nke anya nke atọ m," ọ gwara onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ maka Ceramic Review, "Na nke mbụ m na-ahụ ọrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka mere
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị Fine and Applied Arts course na ceramik na City Lit, Bam egosipụtala ọrụ ya na otu na ngosi nke naanị ya na Europe, North America, na Africa.]
N'afọ 2017, onye nduzi nke London gallery 50 Golborne, Pascale Revert, kpọrọ Bam ka ọ gosipụta ụrọ ya na U.K
Crafts Council's annual Collect exhibition na nke mbụ ya; ọrụ ya gara nke ọma n'ebe ahụ nke e gosipụtara na Collect ruo afọ atọ n'usoro
50 Golborne egosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ntu ha na Contemporary African Art Fair na Paris. N'afọ 2018, o sonyere na ihe ngosi otu onye nlekọta Bisi Silva The Gallery of Small Things na Senegal
Bam enweela ebe obibi na Moly-Sabata [fr] na Sablons, France; Catinca Tabacaru Gallery na Harare, Zimbabwe; na Cité Internationale des Arts na Paris, France, ebe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime ọrịa COVID-19.

A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke V&A na Brooklyn Museum. Site na omume nka ya na ebe obibi ya, na site n'ịkụzi ọmụmụ ihe na nnọkọ mmekọrịta, ọkachasị ndị ya na ndị otu obodo na-enweghị ikike na ndị na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, Bam na-aga n'ihu na-enyocha ohere iwu nke ụrọ na akụkụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.
